publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1203# Mary Scanlon: National Eye Week—That the Parliament welcomes National Eye Week, beginning on 25 September, as a means of highlighting the importance of regular eye examinations and improving visual healthcare, particularly among the elderly, who are susceptible to macular degeneration; notes that more than nine out of ten primary eye examinations in Scotland are carried out by optometrists in the community; draws attention to the increasing partnership between ophthalmologists, general medical practitioners and optometrists in the co-management of eye diseases such as cataract, glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy; notes that such diseases can be ameliorated, provided that they are detected and treated early, and urges health boards and local healthcare co-operatives to devote sufficient resources to ensure that such co-management schemes are available in localities across the whole of Scotland. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Mr David Davidson*, David Mundell*, Mr Brian Monteith*, David McLetchie*

S1M-1203# Mary Scanlon: National Eye Week—That the Parliament welcomes National Eye Week, beginning on 25 September, as a means of highlighting the importance of regular eye examinations and improving visual healthcare, particularly among the elderly, who are susceptible to macular degeneration; notes that more than nine out of ten primary eye examinations in Scotland are carried out by optometrists in the community; draws attention to the increasing partnership between ophthalmologists, general medical practitioners and optometrists in the co-management of eye diseases such as cataract, glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy; notes that such diseases can be ameliorated, provided that they are detected and treated early, and urges health boards and local healthcare co-operatives to devote sufficient resources to ensure that such co-management schemes are available in localities across the whole of Scotland. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Mr David Davidson, David Mundell, Mr Brian Monteith, David McLetchie
S1M-1203# National Eye Week (lodged on 20 September 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1203# National Eye Week (lodged on 20 September 2000) Alex Fergusson*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1203# National Eye Week (lodged on 20 September 2000) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-1203# National Eye Week (lodged on 20 September 2000) Robert Brown*, Phil Gallie*

Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Mr David Davidson, David Mundell, Mr Brian Monteith, David McLetchie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Donald Gorrie, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Phil Gallie, Nick Johnston*
